articles.title: Kim Jong Il Gives Field Guidance to Updated Songdowon Youth Open-Air Theatre
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Gives Field Guidance to Updated Songdowon Youth Open-Air Theatre
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to the updated Songdowon Youth Open-Air Theatre.
					 The 3,000-odd-seater theatre has been renovated to be a modern theatre fully equipped with all facilities necessary for performers and audience.
					
					 Enjoying a bird's-eye view of the splendidly renovated theatre, he said that this was a historic place where an art performance celebrating the 20th anniversary of Korea's liberation was given in August of 1965 in the presence of President Kim Il Sung. He recollected with deep emotion those unforgettable historic days.
					
					 It is an amazing miracle that Kangwon Province completed the renovation project of the theatre by its own efforts and technology in such a brief span of time, he said, adding that this shining success is a precious fruition of the inexhaustible mental power of the party members and other working people of the province who built such monumental structure in the era of Songun as the Wonsan Youth Power Station by their own efforts in the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance. 
					
					 The slogan "We Serve the People!" clearly reflects the unshakable will and determination of the WPK to devote everything to the happiness of the people, placing their interests above all, he said, underlining the need for all officials to enshrine deep in their minds their honorable mission as servants of the people and always use their brains and dedicate themselves to the promotion of the people's wellbeing. 
					
					 He indicated important tasks which would serve as guidelines in managing and operating the theatre.
					
					 He was accompanied by Department Directors Jang Song Thaek and Pak Nam Gi and other leading officials of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Art Performances
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Art Performances
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il, together with servicepersons enjoyed art performances given by the art group of servicemen's families and servicepersons of a company under a sub-unit of KPA Unit 974.
					 Put on the stage were chorus "General of Korea", instrumental music and song "I'll Be the Flower to Herald the Spring", Janggu ensemble "Nilliri for Songun", drum and chorus "Thunder on Jong Il Peak", Kayagum solo "Post in Spring", poem and song "For My Only Motherland" and other numbers of various forms.
					
					 The performers strikingly demonstrated the rock-firm faith and will, revolutionary stamina and indomitable spirit of the KPA and the servicemen's families who are determined to certainly accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche with arms, always remaining true to the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Greatly satisfied to see the admirable performances, Kim Jong Il highly appreciated the art group members and the servicepersons of the company for their successful performances.
					
					 It is of weighty significance in enhancing the combat power of the unit and establishing the revolutionary and militant way of life to conduct vigorous mass cultural and art activities among the servicepersons and servicemen's families, he said, advancing the important tasks that would serve as guidelines in intensifying the mass art activities.
					
					 Accompanying him were general officers of the KPA and department directors and other leading officials of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: Meeting of Women's Organizations of DPRK and China Held
articles.content:
Meeting of Women's Organizations of DPRK and China Held 
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- A meeting of officials of the Central Committee of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea and the members of the delegation of the All-China Women's Federation was held in Pyongyang on Thursday.
					 Present there were officials of the DWUK Central Committee including its Vice-Chairwoman U Kye Hyang and the members of the delegation headed by Vice-President Zhen Yan.
					
					 They talked to one another about the activities of the women's organizations of the two countries and successes and experience gained by them in the past.

articles.title: Economic and Commercial Councilors Corps Visits Jonsung Revolutionary Museum
articles.content:
Economic and Commercial Councilors Corps Visits Jonsung Revolutionary Museum
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- The economic and commercial councilors corps here visited the Jonsung Revolutionary Museum on Thursday on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of the liberation of Korea.
					 The guests paid tribute to the mosaic depicting President Kim Il Sung with boundless reverence for him.
					
					 Being briefed on the fact that the President guided the work of the Cabinet and the Military Commission here and the work in various fields in the days of the hard-fought war, they looked round the office rooms and tunnel, etc.
					
					 At the end of the visit, Chinese Economic and Commercial Councilor Wang Zhilin said that thanks to the wise leadership of the President, the Korean people could achieve victory in the Fatherland Liberation War and wind up the post-war rehabilitation and construction earlier than scheduled.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Visit Pyongyang Mission of AINDF
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Visit Pyongyang Mission of AINDF 
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- Alejandro Cao de Benos, chairman of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain, and Martin Lotscher, chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee, who are staying here visited the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front on Thursday.
					 Chief Jo Il Min and staff members of the mission conversed with the guests.
					
					 The guests informed them of the activities of their organizations before discussing the issues of mutual concern and matters of boosting the solidarity activities in the future.
					
					Jo Il Min referred to the fact that these days progressive publications and Internet websites of south Korea are widely introducing Songun guidance of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He made a detailed account of the struggle of the south Korean people against the Lee Myung Bak group's brutal suppression of the democratic forces for reunification and the workers who struggled to defend their right to existence and its railroading of the evil bill on media through the "National Assembly".
					
					 The guests reiterated their will to positively support the struggle of the south Korean people to implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration in the future, too.
					
					 Then they watched a video showing the south Korean people's struggle against the U.S. and the south Korean "government".
					
					 A joint statement of the KFA and the Switzerland-Korea Committee was released on the same day. 
					
					 The joint statement accused the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean warmongers of going to stage again joint military exercises targeted against the DPRK. This is a blatant challenge to the Korean people and the world progressives desirous of peace and reunification and a provocative act of gravely threatening world peace and security, it said.
					
					 It noted that the organizations join the world peace-loving people opposed to the imperialists' domination and aggression in voicing full support to the struggle of the AINDF and the south Korean people to frustrate the U.S. imperialists and south Korean warmongers' reckless moves for a war against the DPRK.

articles.title: "Selected Works of Kim Jong Il" Off Press
articles.content:
"Selected Works of Kim Jong Il" Off Press
						
Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House brought out Vol. 1 (enlarged edition) of "Selected Works of Kim Jong Il" which comprehensively deals with works of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Contained in the book are 60 works authored by Kim Jong Il from August 25, Juche 49 (1960) when he started his Songun revolutionary leadership to June 12, Juche 53 (1964). 
					
					 Among them are works "Our Leader Is the Great Statesman" and "The Leader of Working Class Plays a Decisive Role in the Revolutionary Struggle", which make an original and scientific clarification of the position and role of the leader of the working class in the revolutionary struggle. 
					
					  In several works he underscored the need to bolster up the Korean People's Army and boost the nation's military muscle by fully preparing the servicepersons politically and ideologically and in military technique and physically, guided by the President's military ideas, theories and tactics. 
					
					 He also clarified the principled issues which would serve as guidelines for the socialist economic construction and the validity of the WPK's line of building an independent national economy. 
					
					 The works explain the issue of properly estimating the history of Korea from a Juche-oriented stand and always relying on one's own efforts, the reactionary nature and harmfulness of modern revisionism and the inevitability of the collapse of the colonial system of imperialism. 
					
					 The book also contains works calling on the Korean nation to unite to drive the U.S. imperialists out of south Korea and achieve the country's reunification and indicating tasks to be fulfilled to develop the Hwanghae Iron Works into a model unit for establishing a new industrial management system.

articles.title: Traffic Control Platform beneath Umbrella Installed at Intersections of Pyongyang
articles.content:
Traffic Control Platform beneath Umbrella Installed at Intersections of Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- Unique platforms under umbrellas are being set up in traffic control posts at intersections of Pyongyang these days, attracting attention of people. 
					 The round platform under well-shaped large umbrella is clearly seen at far distance.
					
					 The umbrella shields the traffic controllers from sunrays and rain and the platform shuts out heat from the heated asphalt.
					
					 The female traffic controllers are commanding the traffic with a bright face on the platform under the umbrella even in the hottest period of summer.
					
					 Passers-by stop walking for a while to see the new scene.
					
					 They say it can be seen only in the country led by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The traffic controllers are moved by the warm affection shown for them by General Secretary Kim Jong Il who saw to it that the platforms with umbrellas are being set up this time after raincoats, rain boots, sunglasses, gloves and cosmetics as well as seasonal uniforms were provided to them.

articles.title: Sightseeing Ship "Pyongyang No.1"
articles.content:
Sightseeing Ship "Pyongyang No.1"
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- The Ryongwang Pier on the opposite bank of the Tower of Juche Idea in Pyongyang is crowded with people getting aboard and off the sightseeing ship "Pyongyang No.1".
					 The ship, going up and down along the Taedong River with holiday-makers on board, adds peculiar beauty to the river.
					
					 They enjoy themselves on the three-storied ship, commanding the scenery of the city.
					
					 Among the sightseers are overseas Koreans and foreigners.
					
					 The ship is furnished with various kinds of amusement facilities and mess-room serving freshwater fish dishes.
					
					 It serves various kinds of broths and dishes made with carp, mandarin fish and others caught in the Taedong River, delighting the customers.
					
					 Foreign tourists said with envy that they were happy to eat freshwater fishes caught in the clean river and that the Sindok Spring Water, Ryongaksan Spring Water and Kangso Mineral Water were so famous because of the clean natural environment of the DPRK free from pollution.
					
					 The sightseeing ship began to operate under the care of President Kim Il Sung to give pleasure and happiness to the people and the popular policies of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Fermented Flatfish Mixed with Yam
articles.content:
Fermented Flatfish Mixed with Yam
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- The medicable fermented flatfish mixed with yam has been made in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea recently.
					 Fermented fish is a kind of kimchi essential in the dietary life of the Korean people.
					
					 Radish has been used traditionally as carbohydrate source in processing fermented fish.
					
					 Pyongyang Foreign Service School has deepened the research into using yam for radish. In this course, the school found out that yam not only ferments the fish well but also adds taste and flavor to it, and realized the scientification and standardization of the processing method.
					
					 The Korean people have used yam widely in their dietary life as staple and subsidiary food materials from old times. Yam is also Koryo medicinal stuff for preventing and treating various diseases.
					
					 According to old Koryo medical books, yam is atoxic and gives no harmful effect on human body, makes people feel very well and helps promoting a long life no matter how long they take it.
					
					 The fermented flatfish mixed with yam has special tartish taste and fragrance and is good to see. People feel well when chewing. It thus stimulates the appetite.
					
					 As yam grows in mountains and fields of the country and has no limitation in storing, one can use it in the season when radish does not grow.
					
					 The fermented flatfish mixed with yam has been registered as an invention of the country some time ago.

articles.title: Japanese Imperialists' Plunder of Underground Resources in Korea
articles.content:
Japanese Imperialists' Plunder of Underground Resources in Korea
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- The Japanese imperialists had plundered a large quantity of underground resources abundant in Korea for over 40 years in the first half of the 20th century.
					 They concocted the "Ulsa (1905) Five-point Treaty" in a gangster-like way at the point of the bayonet to turn Korea into their colony in the beginning of the 20th century. They started pillaging underground resources in a big way while resorting to every conceivable means for converting Korea into a base for sources of raw materials and a base for war supplies to invade the continent.
					
					 In the years from 1911 to 1917, they surveyed the distribution of mineral resources in Korea and were hell-bent on carrying away the underground resources.
					
					 They concocted and issued the so-called "Korean Mining Act" in 1915 to open a way for the Japanese mining capitalists including the "Mitsui Mining Co., Ltd" and the "Hurukawa Mining Joint Venture Company"  to plunder the underground resources of Korea at their own will.
					
					 They also revised some content of the "Korean Mining Act" for the worse in 1916 and exempted gold, silver, lead, iron and other minerals from taxation, thus protecting and fostering their pillage of underground resources.
					
					 According to the curtailed data released by the Japanese imperialists, they shipped nearly 400 tons of gold to Japan during their colonial fascist rule over Korea.
					
					 In 1944 alone, they carried away nine million tons of pig iron and steel on the spot of Korea. If added by the iron ore shipped to Japan, the amount is exorbitant, indeed.
					
					 Besides, they extorted a large quantity of metallic minerals including lead, zinc, nickel, magnesite, manganese and iron sulfide and coal and graphite.
					
					 With the plunder of abundant natural resources of Korea, the monopoly capital of Japan grew and got rich.
					
					 Japan should frankly admit the brutal pillage of the underground resources of Korea and pay due reparation for it.

articles.title: KCNA Slams Japan's Hysteria for Preemptive Nuclear Attack
articles.content:
KCNA Slams Japan's Hysteria for Preemptive Nuclear Attack
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- Japanese Prime Minister Aso openly advocated the theory of preemptive nuclear attack at a press conference held on August 9. 
					 He said that "it is not realistic" to reject a preemptive nuclear attack when it comes to the security of Japan. 
					
					 This means, in a word, that a preemptive nuclear attack alone guarantees the security of Japan. 
					
					 His foolish remarks clearly indicate how potential and grave Japan's nuclear threat to its neighboring countries and other parts of the world is. 
					
					 Japan has been under the "nuclear umbrella" of the United States and possesses the technology of manufacturing nuclear weapons as well as their delivery means, to say nothing of nuclear fuel. This indicates that Japan itself is in a full position to go nuclear. On this basis, the Japanese reactionaries are rushing headlong into a more adventurous nuclear war.
					
					 His outbursts once again clearly prove the hypocrisy and dangerous nature of the assertions of the U.S. and other countries that the DPRK's access to nukes leads to Japan's access to nukes. 
					
					 The theory of "chain reaction" to the access to nukes that Japan is bound to go nuclear in the future because of the DPRK was enunciated on the wrong premise from a logical point of view.
					
					 Preparations for Japan's nuclear weaponization have been already wound up, not a thing to happen in the future. The theory of "chain reaction" to the access to nukes based on the wrong premise is nothing but sophism. 
					
					 Japan is seized with nuclear war fever when humankind is growing stronger in its desire to see a nuclear-free world. This is a direct product of the application of the double standards by the U.S. and other countries to the nuclear issue. 
					
					 They have applied such standards to the nuclear issue, letting loose such unscientific sophism as the above-said theory of "chain reaction," and pushed Japan to such dangerous phase where it is asserting a preemptive nuclear attack as today. They can never evade the responsibility for this. 
					
					 They keep mum about the fact that even at present Japan is openly posing a nuclear threat to the DPRK and its neighboring countries by crying out for a preemptive nuclear attack. 
					
					 "The nuclear issue of north Korea" was cooked up, pursuant to the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK aimed to stifle it in violation of the principle of impartiality. 
					
					 The six-party talks were plagued with such inequality that a certain country was allowed to assert a preemptive nuclear attack while other country was pressurized to dismantle its nukes. This brought the talks to an end.
					
					 The present situation eloquently proves how just the DPRK was when it had access to nuclear deterrence for self-defence and decided to pull out of the six-way talks and how vital and urgent the U.S. retraction of its hostile policy toward the DPRK is for settling the nuclear issue.

articles.title: Japanese Militarists Remain Unchanged in Their Aggressive Nature
articles.content:
Japanese Militarists Remain Unchanged in Their Aggressive Nature
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- The Japanese militarists run the whole gamut of disguising tactics but remain unchanged in their aggressive nature.    
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday observes this in a signed article.
					
					 It cites facts to prove that Japan's monopoly capital rapidly revived and grew corpulent in the post-war period, though it suffered ruin due to the defeat of the Japanese imperialists in the 1940s. This monopoly capital is seeking a way out of various contradictions, difficulties and serious economic crisis at home in overseas expansion, it notes, and goes on:
					
					 Japan's history is a blood-stained history of aggression and war.
					
					 No one can vouch that the Japanese militarist forces keen on overseas expansion will not repeat such war of aggression as the Pacific war in the future.  
					
					 They know well how to wage a war and are experienced in mounting surprise attacks as they fought several wars of aggression in the past. It is as clear as noonday that they will not hesitate to launch again any aggression. 
					
					 The aggressive nature of Japanese militarism will never change just as a leopard can never change its spots. 
					
					 It will be ever-more undisguised in its aggressive nature as it is keen to get more corpulent by invading and dominating other countries and nations through aggression and war.

articles.title: Puppet Military's Moves to Grab Civilians' Land Flayed
articles.content:
Puppet Military's Moves to Grab Civilians' Land Flayed
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- Members of the Joint Measure Committee of Civic and Public Organizations against the Expansion of the Drill Ground in Mugon-ri of south Korea, students and inhabitants in Ohyon-ri held a meeting in Kyonggi Province on Aug. 8 and vowed to struggle against the puppet military authorities' moves to grab land. 
					 The participants in the meeting accused the "Ministry of National Defense" of seeking to grab land of inhabitants in Ohyon-ri for the purpose of expanding the drill ground in Mugon-ri through the "Central Land Expropriation Committee".
					
					 They declared the inhabitants in Ohyon-ri and civic and public organizations would pool efforts and wage a dynamic struggle against the land requisitioning.

articles.title: Puppet Authorities' Unreasonable Repressive Action Denounced
articles.content:
Puppet Authorities' Unreasonable Repressive Action Denounced
						
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet authorities sent a notice to the Democratic Labor Party informing it they would not allow a meeting commemorating the August 15 liberation day to be sponsored by it under the pretexts that its venue is the main avenue of the city and the DLP has records of organizing "illegal meetings".
					 In this connection, a spokesman for the DLP on Aug.10 termed the action taken by the authorities a rash action to deliberately obstruct and suppress the legitimate activities of political parties.
					
					 To disallow the above-said meeting after branding it as "an illegal violent meeting" is an obviously politically motivated suppression as it betrays their ulterior intention to put down the anti-"government" struggle, he stated.
					
					 The recent action taken by the Lee regime to block an event commemorating the August 15 liberation day and praying for reunification is little short of negating the history of the nation, he noted, urging the authorities to retract their unreasonable action at once.

articles.title: Projected Joint Military Exercises Flailed by S. Korean Students
articles.content:
Projected Joint Military Exercises Flailed by S. Korean Students
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- Students in the Seoul area of south Korea held a rally on August 10 in Seoul to denounce the warmongers' projected joint military exercises against the DPRK.
					 At the rally speakers recalled that the south Korea-U.S. "Combined Force Command" announced that it would stage Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises throughout south Korea from August 17 to 27.
					
					 They charged that the maneuvers involving at least 56,000 south Korean troops and more than 10,000 U.S. troops are aimed at stifling the fellow countrymen in the north and threatening the peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 They held that the United States and the south Korean authorities claim the projected exercises are "for the purpose of defense" and "ordinary drills" and the like but they are obviously maneuvers for a war of aggression against the north in terms of their scale and nature.
					
					 They urged the warmongers to cancel the plan for the dangerous exercises and stop the hostile acts against the north as early as possible.

articles.title: Implementation of Inter-Korean Joint Declarations Called for
articles.content:
Implementation of Inter-Korean Joint Declarations Called for
						
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- A meeting of Koreans in Osaka for implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration took place in Japan on Aug. 7.
					 A speech made by Pu Yong Uk, chairman of the Osaka Prefectural Headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, was followed by more speeches at the meeting. 
					
					 The speakers said that the cause of Korea's reunification is sure to be accomplished thanks to the leadership of Kim Jong Il and the inexhaustible strength of all Koreans firmly rallied under the banner of "By our nation itself".
					
					 They noted that they have positively supported the people in the south in their vigorous struggle to achieve independence, democracy and reunification under the uplifted banner of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 They called upon all Koreans at home and abroad to firmly uphold and implement the north-south declarations and intensify the movement for accelerating the country's reunification by their concerted efforts.
					
					 The participants of the meeting watched a video dealing with the south Korean people's mounting anti-"government" struggle.
					
					 Then followed a lecture titled "June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and October 4 Declaration and Past, Present and Future."

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership Praised
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership Praised
Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- A seminar and a book exhibition were held in Italy and a lecture in Guinea on July 24 and August 5 to mark the 49th anniversary of the start of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 On display in the venue of the book exhibition were works of Kim Jong Il and books on the Korean people in the efforts to build a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation.
					
					 Recalling that Kim Jong Il started his Songun leadership on August 25, 1960, Miriam Pelegrini Feri, president of the Group of Dialectical Materialists of Italy, said at the seminar:
					
					 He, who successfully inherited the idea and the cause of President Kim Il Sung, is leading the struggle to build socialism and achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country to victory with main stress put on the military affairs as well as the party work.
					
					 Riyad Chaloub, chief of the Guinean Group for the Study of February 16 Art, said in the lecture: It is thanks to Kim Jong Il's start of Songun leadership that such historic event as overall establishment of the Songun politics, which brought about great changes in the development of the Korean people's destiny, could be witnessed in the late 20th century.
					
					 He stressed that Kim Jong Il's start of Songun leadership will shine forever with the history of socialist Korea winning one victory after another.

articles.title: Appeal of Philippine Preparatory Committee Supported
articles.content:
Appeal of Philippine Preparatory Committee Supported
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- Yehia Zakaria Khairullah, chairman of the Egyptian Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, issued a statement on August 5 in support of the appeal which was sent to the organizations of friendship and solidarity with the Korean people by the Philippine preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					  I am happy to participate in the work to form the international preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of Kim Il Sung who performed undying exploits for global independence, he said in his statement, adding:
					
					 Kim Il Sung is the greatest man who fathered the immortal Juche idea, the guiding idea in the era of independence, turned Korea formerly suffering from centuries-old backwardness and poverty into a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence and made undying contributions to the peace and security of Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					The revolutionary cause of the President is being successfully carried forward thanks to the original Songun politics of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 After inaugurating the Egyptian preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of the President the committee will conduct colorful activities with the preparatory committees of the friendly and peace-loving countries and take an active part in the work for erecting statues of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Referring to the need for widely conducting the work of publishing, studying and disseminating the works of the President and Kim Jong Il and publishing books praising the exploits of the peerlessly great persons and other colorful political and cultural events, he stressed that he will fully support the just cause of the Korean people.

articles.title: Bulletin on Modern Korea and Songun Issued in Pakistan
articles.content:
Bulletin on Modern Korea and Songun Issued in Pakistan
Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- The Pakistan Society for the Study of Independence issued the bulletin titled "Modern Korea and Songun" on August 5, on the occasion of the 49th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 It gave a detailed account of the fact that President Kim Il Sung founded the Juche idea and the Songun idea during his early revolutionary activities and won one victory after another by providing the Songun revolutionary leadership in the whole period of his revolutionary activities. 
					
					 The bulletin went on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung's Songun idea and mode of Songun revolutionary leadership are now being confidently carried forward and steadily developed in depth by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Songun idea and the Songun politics would be unthinkable without the leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the past and present of modern Korea, socialist Korea, would also be unthinkable without Songun. 
					
					 The DPRK will always emerge victorious thanks to Songun.

articles.title: 100th Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung to Be Observed in Iran
articles.content:
100th Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung to Be Observed in Iran
 Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- An Iranian national preparatory committee was inaugurated in Teheran on August 5 to commemorate the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The chairman of the Al Hadi Islam Propaganda Organization of Iran was elected chairman of the preparatory committee at its inaugural ceremony.
					
					 The committee decided to hold colorful events including meeting, film show and photo exhibition.
					
					A message to General Secretary Kim Jong Il was adopted at the ceremony.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno el Anfiteatro Juventud de Songdowon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno el Anfiteatro Juventud de Songdowon
 Pyongyang, 13 de agosto (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno el reconstruido Anfiteatro Juventud de Songdowon.
					  Esta institucion cultural con mas de 3 mil asientos es un moderno teatro en que estan aseguradas en lo suficiente todas las condiciones necesarias para ofrecer las funciones y presenciarlas.
					
					  Al contemplar el perfil del anfiteatro acondicionado elegantemente, el Dirigente evoco los dias historicos e inolvidables diciendo que en este lugar significativo tuvo lugar en agosto de 1965 la funcion festiva del vigesimo aniversario de la liberacion de la patria con la presencia del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					
					  Resulta un milagro sorprendente el hecho de que la provincia de Kangwon termino en un tiempo tan corto con sus propias fuerzas y tecnicas la obra de reconstruccion del teatro, apunto.
					
					Agrego que este orgulloso exito deviene el precioso resultado de la inagotable potencia espiritual de los militantes del partido y otros trabajadores de esa provincia quienes construyeron por cuenta propia las creaciones monumentales de la epoca del Songun como la Central Hidroelectrica Juventud de Wonsan manifestando plenamente el espiritu revolucionario de autoconfianza.
					
					  Subrayo que en la consigna "!Servir al pueblo!" estan reflejadas directamente la firme voluntad y decision de nuestro partido que dedica lo todo a la felicidad del pueblo poniendo en el primer lugar los intereses de este.
					
					  Enfatizo que todos los funcionarios deben pensar mucho y trabajar con abnegacion para fomentar el bienestar del pueblo teniendo siempre presente de su honrosa mision de servidor al pueblo.
					
					  El Dirigente indico las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia en la administracion y la operacion del teatro.
					
					  En esta ocasion el fue acompanado por los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek y Pak Nam Gi, y otros cuadros directivos del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia funciones artisticas preparadas por Unidad No. 974 del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia funciones artisticas preparadas por Unidad No. 974 del EPC
Pyongyang, 13 de agosto (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, presencio junto con los oficiales y soldados del EPC la funcion del grupo artritico de las esposas de oficiales de un destacamento adscrito a la Unidad No.974 del EPC y la otra de los militares de una compania perteneciente a la misma unidad.
					Los ejecutantes presentaron en la escena el coro "General de Corea", el instrumento musical y cancion "Sere la flor que anuncia primero la llegada de la primavera", la cancion con acompanamiento de Janggo (instrumento musical coreano) "Niliri del Songun", el tambor y coro "Trueno en el pico Jongil", el solo de Kayagum (instrumento musical coreano) "Primavera en el puesto", la poesia y cancion "Por la unica patria" y otras piezas de diversos generos.
					
					A traves de las funciones, los ejecutantes manifestaron patentemente la ferrea conviccion, la voluntad y el impetu revolucionario e indoblegable del EPC y las esposas de los oficiales de llevar a feliz termino con el fusil la causa revolucionaria del Juche siguiendo siempre con gran fidelidad al Dirigente.
					
					Muy satisfecho por las magnificas funciones ofrecidas por los ejecutantes, el Dirigente aprecio mucho sus exitos logrados en la ocasion.
					
					Anadio que librar dinamicas actividades artisticas y culturales masificadas entre los militares y las esposas de los oficiales tiene gran importancia para elevar la combatividad y establecer el revolucionario y combativo modo de vida en las unidades y presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia para intensificarlas.
					
					Disfrutaron las funciones los generales del EPC, los jefes de departamento y otros cuadros directivos del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun critica invariable atributo agresivo de Japon
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun critica invariable atributo agresivo de Japon
Pyongyang, 13 de agosto (ATCC) -- Si bien los imperialistas japoneses se disfrazan hoy de una manera u otra, su naturaleza de agresor sigue siendo la misma de antes, revela el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual difundido este jueves y continua:
					El capital monopolista de Japon, que corria el riesgo de bancarrota debido a la derrota sufrida por el imperialismo japones en la decada de los 40 del siglo XX, renacio y se engordo a un ritmo acelerado en el tiempo posbelico, comienza el articulista y prosigue:
					
					El capital monopolista de Japon busca en la expansion a ultramar la salida de las contradicciones, dificultades y seria crisis economica que afronta en el ambito nacional.
					
					La historia de este pais es la de agresiones y guerras manchadas de sangre.
					
					No hay ninguna garantia de que las fuerzas militaristas japonesas enloquecidas por el expansionismo a ultramar no reproducirian en el futuro la Guerra del Pacifico del siglo pasado.
					
					Ellas son capaces de lanzar de nuevo cualquier agresion porque se han habituado a la guerra y al ataque sorpresivo en varias guerras de agresion acontecidas en el pasado.
					
					La naturaleza agresiva del militarismo japones no cambiara nunca como el lobo que no puede convertirse en la oveja.
					
					Se tornara cada dia mas fuerte la naturaleza agresiva de los militaristas japoneses que tratan de engordarse mas exterminando y dominando a otros paises y naciones a traves de la agresion y la guerra.

articles.title: Plataformas de control de trafico y paraguas en cruces de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Plataformas de control de trafico y paraguas en cruces de Pyongyang
						
 Pyongyang, 13 de agosto (ATCC) -- En estos dias, aparecieron en los cruces de Pyongyang los raros puestos de control del transito, que llaman las vistas de los transeuntes.
					  Desde lejos saltan a la vista el hermoso y gran paraguas y la plataforma redonda instalada abajo. 
					
					  Estos aparatos protegen a las controladoras de la seguridad del transito desde los rayos de sol ardiente, las lluvias torrenciales y del calor de la carretera calentada por el sol.
					
					  En virtud de tal paraguas y plataforma, aun en el calor canicular ellas cumplen agilmente el control del trafico.
					
					  Los transeuntes se paran un momento y miran paisaje singular expresando la admiracion.
					
					  Este nuevo aspecto lo pueden ver solo en Corea que disfruta del liderazgo del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, quien hizo enviar a ellas el vestido, el impermeable, las botas, los espejuelos de color, los guantes y los cosmeticos en cada estacion y tomo esta vez la medida de instalar dicha plataforma y  el paraguas.
